name: Dance, Pathetic Marionette
originalText: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. Choose one of the revealed creature cards and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put all other cards revealed this way into their owners' graveyards.

rulings.text: You’ll put just one creature card onto the battlefield this way. The other revealed creature cards, and all the revealed noncreature cards, will wind up in their owners’ graveyards.

If an opponent has no creature cards left in their library, that player will wind up revealing their entire library and putting it into their graveyard. You’ll still get to choose a creature card revealed by another player.

text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. Choose one of the revealed creature cards and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put all other cards revealed this way into their owners' graveyards.
